name: Demolition-Crew
description:
Play alone against time and enemies to get to the top of different buildings and hit the bell to mark the building ready for demolition. On your way you will find blocked paths and vicious enemies that will try to stop you. Smash and blow your way through walls and obstacles to find your way to the top.

You can also play with a friend by starting a local game and let your friend connect if he or she is on the same local network. (Experimental)
